summary.description: minimal coordinated supports for fast enumeration of minimal cut sets in metabolic networks | Codes and data of competitive methods for finding minimal cut sets of a metabolic network | Files for the work on metabolic networks with Leonid, Tamon, Cedric, Reza, Hooman, and Nafiseh | You need to have licensed MATLAB before running the scripts | There are implemenations of four approaches for enumerating MCSs here. You can run either of them by running its script followed by model name followed by target reaction followed by 1 or 0 which indicates prior network reduction. -1 stands for all reactions
summary.name: MCS2
